channel.title: Npc dialogue in project 16 v. 6
channel.description: Is it possible to have npc dialogue in project 16 v. 6? I have tried the traditional way like making a case then putting if npcid == blah blah blah then npcwannetalk = blah blah blah. No errors but when I talk to the npc it doesn't do anything =\ any help? I don't mean words over their head I mean like in real rs where they talk in the chat box. Thanks :D

item.title: Npc dialogue in project 16 v. 6
item.dc:creator: @jonyo jonyo
item.description:
@jonyo wrote:

ya it took me like 3 days to switch over to v.6 when it came out lol

Read full topic

item.title: Npc dialogue in project 16 v. 6
item.dc:creator: @Billys_Java Billys Java
item.description:
@Billys_Java wrote:

np and i know it sucks lol. i hated it when i had to move everything i made on my server to testscape. Then make the quests.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc dialogue in project 16 v. 6
item.dc:creator: @jonyo jonyo
item.description:
@jonyo wrote:

Billys Java:

that is because in project 16 the dialogue box show up in the top left hand corner of the screen and you can put any text in them. The only way you can get them to work is using testscape. I used project 16 for a long time then i wanted to start making quests but i ran into that problem so i switched to testscape. I still prefere project 16 over testscape though

CRAP that sucks… I was making a cool christmas quest now I have to do sendMessage =\ cause testscape sucks compared to project 16 and it would take waaaaay to long for me to switch lol thanks anyways guys

Read full topic

item.title: Npc dialogue in project 16 v. 6

item.description:
@jonyo wrote:

Is it possible to have npc dialogue in project 16 v. 6? I have tried the traditional way like making a case then putting if npcid == blah blah blah then npcwannetalk = blah blah blah. No errors but when I talk to the npc it doesn’t do anything =\ any help? I don’t mean words over their head I mean like in real rs where they talk in the chat box. Thanks
